Text: Thanks for the up, I posted the Audio version if you're interested.
Really great book!  Anyone have a synthesizer for Hawking's voice?  Thanks!

@ SatchMo7:

Read the Tao Te Ching as a companion? Are you fucking kidding me? If you want to read something that uses A LOT of imagination when comparing Physics to arcane mysticism read The Tao of Physics by Fritjof Capra. It's amusing and fun to think about, but bullshit, nonetheless.

I just have to weigh in here - the Tao Te Ching is one of the most incredible and imaginative books of speculative philosophy ever written.  I particular recommend the version by Stephen Mitchell.  "The meaning does not lie on the surface."
